eu.trentorise.opendata.josman

Class JosmanProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.opendata.josman.JosmanProject

  • public class JosmanProject
extends Object
    Represents a Josman project, holding information about maven and git repository.
    Author:
    David Leoni

        File copyStream(InputStream sourceStream,
              String relPath,
              eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.SemVersion version,
              List<String> relPaths)
        Copies provided stream to destination, which is determined according to relPath, preprendedPath and version
        Parameters:
        sourceStream -
        relPath - path relative to root, i.e. docs/README.md or img/mypic.jpg
        version -
        Returns:
        the target file

      • copyMdAsHtml

        void copyMdAsHtml(InputStream sourceMdStream,
                String relPath,
                eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.SemVersion version,
                List<String> relpaths)
        Writes an md stream as html to outputFile
        Parameters:
        outputFile - Must not exist. Eventual needed directories in the path will be created
        relPath - path relative to sourceRepoDir, i.e. img/mypic.jpg or docs/README.md
        version - The version the md page refers to.
        relpaths - a list of relative paths for the sidebar

      • isSnapshotMode

        public boolean isSnapshotMode()
        Returns true if the website generator will only process the current branch snapshot. Otherwise all released versions will be processed.
